title: News: Mercury Prize 2011 Albums of the Year Announced
content:
The nominations for the Mercury Music Awards were announced last night.

It’s very unlikely the list will take anyone off guard, at times it reads like a checklist of potential UK exports, but regardless, it’s solid. The biggest surprise this year was the inclusion of Gwilym Simcock’s jazz album, Good Days at Schloss Elmau, a delightful little album that more than deserves to be there.

Other than that it was all rather predictable, read the full list below.

Barclaycard Mercury Prize 2011 Albums of the Year:
Adele – 21
Anna Calvi – Anna Calvi
Elbow – Build A Rocket Boys!
Everything Everything – Man Alive
Ghostpoet – Peanut Butter Blues & Melancholy Jam
Gwilym Simcock – Good Days at Schloss Elmau
James Blake – James Blake
Katy B – On A Mission
King Creosote & Jon Hopkins – Diamond Mine
Metronomy – The English Riviera
PJ Harvey – Let England Shake
Tinie Tempah – Disc-Overy
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
